Question & Options:

Options:
A. The soundtrack was released on M.I.A.'s record label N.E.E.T.
B. The music from the motion picture was composed by A.R. Rahman.
C. Slumdog Millionaire is a movie that features this soundtrack.
D. All of the above

Options:
A. a) The soundtrack was released on N.E.E.T. record label.
B. b) *Slumdog Millionaire* won a Golden Globe Award for Best Original Score.
C. c) A.R. Rahman composed the soundtrack for *Slumdog Millionaire*.
D. d) All of the above

B. The soundtrack is composed by A.R. Rahman.
C. The soundtrack is titled 'Music from the Motion Picture'.
D. All of the above

Options:
